dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Astana city administration is really limiting the guest list for the May 7th military parade this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Astana city administration is really limiting the guest list for the May seventh military parade this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana city administration has published information about who has been invited to the military parade scheduled to take place in the capital on May 7. For the sake of public safety and orderly organization of the event, live attendance of the parade is limited this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw that—only veterans, home front workers, and specific military units are invited, right? No general public at all.

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, which is a pretty strict move. They're citing security concerns, uh, especially with large gatherings and all the military equipment involved.

dialogue_turns.text: So it's not like people are totally left out. But still, no showing up to the actual venue without an invite—traffic restrictions and everything.
